message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000.  It's a great deal, as you know the value is much higher. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't commit to $1,150,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,050,000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000, which still gives you a significant advantage. Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.
